text: Enrique Mari Bacay Gil V (born 30 March 1992) is a Filipino actor, dancer, model, and singer. Gil has appeared in a number of movies and television shows such as Mula Sa Puso, Budoy, Muling Buksan Ang Puso and She's the One. He is best known for playing Alexander "Xander" Grande III in the television series Forevermore in 2014â€“15, with Liza Soberano. Since then, he has starred in the movies Just The Way You Are (2015), Everyday I Love You (2015), Dukot (2016), My Ex and Whys (2017), Seven Sundays (2017), and Alone/Together; (2019) and the television series Dolce Amore (2016) Bagani (2018), and Make It with You (2020). == References == == Other websites == * Category:1992 births Category:Filipino singers Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors Category:Filipino models Category:Dancers Category:Living people Category:Actors from Cebu
title: Enrique Gil
